short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reverts Otago Uni webpages back to how they were!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension change Otago University webpages back to the old colour scheme and logo! Is still a work in progress so won't work on all sites but am constantly updating it!

Feedback/suggestions/errors/concerns - tim.j.henderson2@gmail.com
